User-agent: *
# Allow everything by default
Allow: /

# Block non-SEO/system pages
Disallow: /verify-email
Disallow: /reset-password
Disallow: /forgot-password
Disallow: /auth/
Disallow: /dashboard
Disallow: /account
Disallow: /settings
Disallow: /api/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://shrtnly.pro/sitemap.xml
